title: Brown spots on leaves? No problem!!

tasks.task: Cut brown spot off leaf to allow photosynthesis.
subtasks: Identify leaf with good green color and small brown spot.
Determine to remove only the brown spot rather than the entire leaf.
Position cutting tool (e.g., scissors or pruning shears) near the brown spot.
Make precise cut around the brown spot, removing it while preserving the surrounding green tissue.
